thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Saudi Crown Prince Turns From Turmoil at Home to Diplomacy Abroad

author: Margherita Stancati
title: Saudi Crown Prince Turns From Turmoil at Home to Diplomacy Abroad
text:
Saudi Arabia’s heir to the throne is going on the road to persuade allies that his efforts to remake the kingdom’s politics and economy will bring greater regional stability and commercial opportunities.
The crown prince, Mohammed bin Salman, arrived Sunday in Cairo, where he met Egypt’s president, Abdel Fattah Al Sisi, in a visit that was tantamount to an endorsement for the former general who has jailed or sidelined challengers ahead of upcoming national elections.
... RELATED VIDEO Prince Mohammed bin Salman's Ambitious Plans for Saudi Arabia Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has huge ambitions for change in Saudi Arabia. But will his reforms also mean greater turbulence in the Middle East? WSJ's Niki Blasina reports. Photo: Getty
